transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji, ji, namaskar sir, Prabhat baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se, kaise hai sir aap?
Executive: Thik hai sir, boliye.
Customer: Ji, mai keh raha tha aapka profile chal raha tha sir, Saraswati Plaster ke naam se jo profile chal rahi thi. Hmm. To usme sir kya issue aa raha hai sir? Abhi aapne sir matlab Pranshu se baat hui thi sir, to koi dikkat aa rahi hai sir? Usme feedback diya tha ke satisfied nahi hai profile se.
Customer: Sir issue sab issue ye hai sir kya batau aapko?
Executive: Bataiye sir, sir dekhiye jab bhi aapke executive se baat hota hai, to uska sir mai as a manager call kar raha hu janne ke liye ki matlab kya raha sir Pranshu to aise services to apne customer ko achhi hi deta hai sir, purana employee hai wo.
Customer: Dekho abhi mere ko kam se kam jude hue isse kam se kam saat aath mahine upar ho gaye. Thik hai na?
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sir.
Customer: Ha minimum nahi sir, chaar se chaar paanch hi customer jude hai mushkil se. Hmm.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Aur dusra isme requirement nahi aati. Jitna quantity bulk me chahiye isme isme jo 25000 amount bharte hai na, 25000 se upar hai wo nahi aata hai. Kya karan kya hai? Pehle amount aata 50 ka aata, usme fir 1.5 lakh ka aata, fir lakh ka aata, fir 5 lakh ka aata. Value nahi de rakhi isme sir.
Executive: Sir dekhiye, bilkul aap thik keh rahe hai but kahi na kahi sir aapko teen chaar deal mili hai but samay ke hisab se competition bhi to badha hai na sir. Abhi aap sabse basic plan me jud rahe hai. To aap jo plan liye hai wo ek basic plan hai. Jitne bhi log judte hai wo is plan me aate hi aate hai. To samay ke sath apna thoda sa agar aapke upar log aa gaye to unko thoda sa inquiry badh gayi hai. Abhi aap deal kaha local me karte hai pan India me karte hai aap?
Customer: Abhi dekho zyada tar to sir dekho Rajasthan, Gujarat, MP me sir is side Haryana side is side Delhi me. Thik hai na?
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ha, all India me transportation costly badh jata hai. Us hisab se nahi ho pata hai. Apne zyada tar to Maharashtra me aur Gujarat ke andar zyada chalta hai aur idhar itna.
Executive: Isme dekhiye aapke paas ek lead hai gypsum plaster ki 44 minute pehle aayi hai Pune Maharashtra se 2000 kg ki requirement hai dekhiye aap, order value bhi achha hai.
Customer: 2000 kg ye jo maang raha hai wo mere paas nahi hai na sir humne bolna. Humne jo product add kiye us par aana chahiye.
Executive: Sir wo plaster keyword se match karta hu na ki ha plaster ka jo keyword hai wo keyword same same keyword ke hisab se aata hai sir ye cheez aati hai. Aur rahi baat aap is par thoda sa TrustSeal ki taraf kyu nahi ja rahe hai aap? Thoda TrustSeal ki taraf improve karo to aapka listing pure pan India me improve hoga ya aap jo jo city me demand kar rahe ho Gujarat, Maharashtra waha naam thoda top par aayega to visibility bhi increase hogi aapki.
Customer: Ab isme mai kya karu ye jo 25000 25000 tak value de rakha hai uske aage value isme hai hi nahi ki 25 se 50 ho gaya, 1.5 lakh ho gaya. Uske category me koi hai hi nahi, option bhi nahi hai. Pehle option aa raha tha abhi option bhi nahi aa raha hai. Kareeban chaar paanch mahine ho gaya.
Executive: Kaunsa wala bol rahe hai aap?
Customer: Ye jo amount aata hai na amount pehle 25000 se 25000 se fir 50000 hota hai fir lakh, 1.5 lakh jis ke hisab se.
Executive: Achha wo, wo to sir system me apne hisab se change hota hai dobara ho jayega. Abhi aap product aur zyada daliye, product aur koshish kijiye multiple naam se daliye. Usse bhi aapki inquiry improve hogi aur rating par focus kijiye sir review rating apni badhaiye. Abhi mai dekh raha hu to aapka review rating jo hai wo kam hai. Mai aapke area par total jo rating mujhe dikh rahi hai wo dikh rahi hai paanch rating. Correct. Hmm hmm. To rating aap improve karoge tabhi aapka profile hoga. Response quality delivery teen cheez sir aapki rating hoti hai keval. Thik hai paanch wo rating agar ye rating agar aap badhaoge logo se zyada rating mangoge to fayda rahega. Maan lo aapke profile pe dekhenge 20 log 25 logo ne aapko rating diya to aapke liye benefit hai sir rating improve hogi.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To wahi mai keh raha tha rating aap improve karayenge to aapke liye benefit rahega thoda sa. Rating kis se dilaye jaise customer judenge to rating denge na sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi zaroori nahi hai judne par hi rating dete hai. Maan lo aap buy lead kharid ke baat karte ho, correct? Hmm. Aapne achha response bhi unko diya maan lo. To kya mai aapko ek WhatsApp par ek cheez dekhiye aap hold kijiye zara. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Maine aapko ek high ka message kiya hai dekhiye sir. Hmm hmm. Sir aap dekhoge agar aap hmm to aapke area me rating jo hai ye aapki rating hai review 4.8 ka dikh raha hai but kam logo ne rating di hai. Rating to bahut achhi hai 4.8 achha number hota hai but zyada logo ne rate karenge to aapka plus point hoga. Hmm hmm, samajh gaya.

Customer: Samajh gaya sir samajh gaya.
Executive: Ye dekhiye to yaha par aap is tarah se bol sakte hai na ki sir mera response kaisa hai quality kaisi hai delivery kaisa hai wo saari cheeze. Hmm hmm.
Customer: Sahi baat hai. Hai na? Sahi sahi.
Executive: To yahi sir cheeze hai ki thoda sa sir hum aapko usi base par karte hai ki rating wagera apni badhaiye improvement badhaiye thoda thoda sir aapka bhi profile improve hoga. Plus hmm. Thoda sa buy lead product aur multiple ek product ko teen chaar tarike se jante hai. To wo product ko mai aur is aapko bataunga aur kya product dal sakte hai to usse bhi aapki inquiry improve hogi. Jitna zyada ek product par naam daloge na utna fayde rahega aapka. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aur TrustSeal ka ye hota hai ki jaise ek certificate hota hai TrustSeal ka jaise aapke area me jo hai na kuch kuch customer wo TrustSeal chala rahe hai. Isme aap mujhe ek baar reply kijiye high ka. High ka reply kijiye is par jo maine bheja hai. WhatsApp par? Ji, bhej diya aapko. Ye service ki mai baat kar raha hu aapko. Ye service aapko lene ke liye bol raha hu mai. Isme kya hoga ki aapka conversion jo hoga na bahut achha aapka badhega sir. TrustSeal me. Ye video aap dekhiyega aur mai aapke sath quotation bhi bhej raha hu ye dekhiyega. Isme kya hoga maan ke chalo aapne ek saal ka hume kitna pay kiya tha? 28 plus GST ya 32 plus GST abhi pay kiya hoga abhi 25 plus GST hai. Ab iska renewal karne jayenge tab bhi aapko 32 plus GST pay karna padega. Wahi agar aap do saal ka basic amount pay karte ho 32 32 64000 rupaye wahi 70000 rupaye plus GST me do saal ka ye renewal bhi ho jata hai aur TrustSeal bhi mil jati hai. Saal me bas do saal me 8000 rupaye extra pay karna hai. Dekho basic basic aapka 64000 rupaye ka ho gaya basic wala plan. 6000 rupaye aur mila diye 70 plus GST me TrustSeal kyu na le lo? Pehla fayda TrustSeal lene ka aap pure aapke Rajasthan me top par Gujarat me top par pure pan India me top 20 me. Aur aapke upar do type ke customer honge jinhone star supplier liya jinhone leading supplier liya hai. To ye fayda hoga sir visibility aapki increase hogi. Calls aapki increase hogi sir conversion achha badhega. Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur sir dekho filhal abhi to chal raha hai yahi. Dekhte hai fir aage. Kya? Abhi to ye chalne do aur kya sir?
Executive: Sir abhi ye aap abhi sir mai thoda sa ye bolunga abhi aap isko chalaiye but abhi aapka fayda hai abhi aapka renewal jo hai wo time hai February me hai. To aapka November, December, January, February chaar mahine ka paisa adjust ho jayega jo aapka sir. Hmm hmm. Nuksan kuch nahi hai aur conversion aapka jo business hai wo do teen guna badhega sir. Abhi aapko kitni call aati hai ek mahine me ye bataiye.
Customer: Call to sir kam hi aati hai call hum zyada tar to call hum hi karte hai mai hi karta hu sir.
Executive: Sir aati hai call aap dekhiye aapke paas jo call aayi hai ye aapka call ka ratio hai. 10 call, 12 call, 13 call ye aapka call ka ratio hai. Wahi agar aapki mai baat karta hu jo aapke area me jo log TrustSeal pe cheez me jude hue hai unka call ka flow agar aap dekhoge to unka call ka flow ke lagbhag lagbhag 20 call 25 call ka rehta hai. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ab dekho aapke area me baat karta hu Rajan Sons ne Rajan Sons ye company ka naam hai na? Saraswati, ha. April Saraswati Plaster, correct. Hmm hmm. Ek minute aapke paas jo calls aa rahi hai aapke paas 10 call 10 call aa rahi hai. Ab wahi aapke area me jinhone TrustSeal le rakha hai gypsum plaster me unka mai aapko dikha raha hu Barmer aapke liye mai dikha de raha hu aap unko relate kar pao. Barmer me Jai Bhavani Plaster and P.O.P se company hai. Hmm hmm. Zyada jante honge unko. Thik hai? Thik hai. Hmm hmm. Inka dekhiye aap call flow dekhiye kitna zyada hai. Inhone star supplier le rakha hai TrustSeal se thoda sa upar but TrustSeal automatically laga hai inme. Hmm hmm. Ye dekhiye sir inke profile par aapka kya hai TrustSeal laga hua hai. Aur inka aap dekho inka Jai Barmer wale ka hai. Ab Jai Barmer ka agar mai aapko dikhau hmm hmm to inke profile par aisa certificate laga rehta hai. Ye yellow colour ka sign to aisa ek certificate aapko milega. Achha. Aap video dekhoge jo maine aapko bheja hai na link par to aapko thoda samajh me aayega. Ha video dekh liya aapne bheja mai dekh lunga. Ha ye dekhiye inka aap wo dekhiye certificate dekhiye aur aisa profile par na koi bahar ke samne jo profile khulti hai to aisa usme likha rehta hai sir. Achha achha. TrustSeal. Ji sir ha fir sir TrustSeal zaroori hoti hai ye ISO certification ki tarah hota hai sir. Aur isme lead bhi double ho jayegi agar aapko 10 lead weekly ki mil rahi hai ek lead daily ki mil rahi hai TrustSeal me aapko 20 lead weekly ki milegi do lead daily ki milegi. YouTube promotion hoga Facebook promotion hoga Instagram me saari cheeze bhi add hongi sir. Hmm hmm. Samajh gaya sir. To wahi cheez mai aap se keh raha hu bas thoda sa isko kara ke dekhiye aapka do teen mahine ka paisa bhi nuksan nahi hoga aur thoda sa samay ke hisab se kar loge bhi aap karte to aapke area me kaunsi position hogi mai keh raha hu baat karta hu aap jo jude hue ho aapke sath kaun kaun se log hai ek to Jai Bhavani hai. Hmm. Dusre fir aapka second number par aapka naam aa jayega. Baki Jai Bhavani Plaster, Saraswati Plaster, Satariya Minerals, Bajrang Plaster ye saare basic me hai. Fir aapka ye Bikaner me company hai Devasri Mineral Corporation. Aur Eco was inter paiye ye dono TrustSeal me hai. Baki basic me hai. Only for gypsum ki aa rahi hai meri baat suno itne maine product add kiye uske only for gypsum ki aa rahi hai bentonite ki bhi nahi aa rahi hai. Sir actually kya hota hai na sir product ki inquiry alag alag hoti hai gypsum me hamare paas zyada inquiry ho gayi isme gypsum de rahe hai. Baki product aap na search kiya karo buy lead ko jab koi keyword ki lead na dikhe na to aap us keyword ko type kar liya karo apne system par. To aapko uski lead dikhne lagegi. Hmm hmm. Baki ek baar video meeting par kal aao mai ek baar video meeting par kuch cheeze dikhata hu aapko thoda sa clarity milegi aapko. Chalo abhi dekhte hai subah to filhal kya phone karna hota hai sir. Kya? Subah call karte hai abhi to filhal mai kahi baitha hu us hisab se. Subah 10 11 baje call karenge to baat ho jayega sir jo bolenge us hisab se. Mere ko customer judne chahiye aur kuch nahi sir dekho. Ab dekho teen chaar jude hai teen chaar bhi basic plan me sab thik thak hota hai yaha log basic plan me sir bas promotion hota hai kuch nahi judte hai to aap TrustSeal loge to aur achha nikaloge kyuki aap bhi active rehte ho. TrustSeal me TrustSeal me kitna customer judenge mahine ke hisab se? Sir dekho guarantee judne ke liye to sir isse bhi double hi judta hai sir. Call badhengi business badhega to conversion kyu nahi judega sir conversion aapke upar aur nikaliye aur rating badhaiye bas conversion TrustSeal me bilkul judega zyada judega isse. Hmm. Wahi samjha raha hu sir thoda sa isko TrustSeal me rahenge mai aapko quotation wagera bhi bhej deta hu TrustSeal ka ya aapko isse quotation bhej sakte hai ye wala jo aapko bheja hai na hmm hmm isse ye aapko TrustSeal ka hai isse aap bhej denge. Achha achha. Chalo mai ye dekh ke fir mai aapko subah morning me bata deta hu aur kya hai. Thik hai. Thik hai sir thik hai aap boliyega to mai aapko final price bata dunga discounted price kya padega aur kal video meeting par mai bol raha hu ek baar aaiye us par bhi dekhte hai baat karte hai thik hai? Thik hai. Thik hai sir thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not satisfied with current plan.

- Wants more buyleads and customer engagement.

- Amount value is limited to 25000.

- Only gypsum leads are being generated.



Resolution:

- Executive explained benefits of TrustSeal.

- Executive shared TrustSeal quotation.

- Executive shared tips to improve rating.

- Executive shared benefits of multiple product listings.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review and revert in the morning.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, rating, subscription, product listing
